ovdesc.p: This application acts as the input feed into the automatic settlements engine.

Buy entering a series of criteria the user can specify a set of trades on which the engine will attempt to produce settlements, these settlements will be created in the DX.CLOSEOUT file, which is the central access point for
If a field is not spcified then all values for that field will be selected.

1 CUSTOMER.......... 50030 DAVID BROWN LTD. 2 PORTFOLIO......... 3 EXCHANGE.CODE..... 3 LIFFE 4 MATURITY.DATE..... 5 CONTRACT.CODE..... 6 STRIKE............ 7 CALL.PUT.......... CALL 8 RESERVED10........ 9 RESERVED9.........

These selection criteria will attempt to select all trades for customer 50030 for any of there portfolio that has traded on exchange 3 (LIFFE) with any maturity period for any contract traded on LIFFE at any strike prices, but only CALL contracts.

If any lots can be settled by the automatic settlement engine then the system will create a new DX.CLOSEOUT record, and prompt the user that it has done so, with a Profit & Loss figure and the ID of the new DX.CLOSEOUT record.
If any closeouts are created that are in error then they can simply be removed from the system by deleteing the closeout records in the DX.CLOSEOUT file.
